002.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_002

001.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_001

000.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_000

003.how_to_trigger: Start Act 2 epilogue with Florrick being present and speak with the Flaming Fist.Debug Book -> Set quest flags -> Act 2 -> SCE - Epilogue -> Set up good path -> End debrief dialog -> Speak with S_SCE_StandingFlamingFist_003

002_0.speaker: Flaming Fist
002_0.text: Let's regroup and march. I don't know if I can wait around much longer.

002_1.speaker: Flaming Fist
002_1.text: My mum lives in the Lower City. If those freaks hurt her, I'll turn them inside out.

001_0.speaker: Flaming Fist
001_0.text: We should march. Rest, maybe - then march.

001_1.speaker: Flaming Fist
001_1.text: Can't believe there are mind flayers targeting Baldur's Gate. We can't let them gain a foothold.

000_0.speaker: Flaming Fist
000_0.text: Safe return to the city. We'll see you there, Helm willing.
